name: Portal Dash (Oliver Smith)
description:
How to play - 

Collect batteries within the level in order to power you spaceship in order to complete the game, spend the batteries to activate the portals to enter each of the levels.

Credits - 

Oliver Smith - Creator

Hoange Anh Trinh - Music

David Toussaint - 3D Modeling

Kristiyan Marinov - 3D Modeling

Khadija Ahmed - Logo
